title: Don’t Be Obssessed, Please Divorce! - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Childhood Promise   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Royalty   Second Chance   Secret Identity   Survival   Tomboyish Female Lead   Unconditional Love
author: Eun Seobin   은서빈
description:
Count’s Brill’s only daughter, Edellis Brill.

In the library, she read a book about herself being stabbed by the Emperor, eventually causing her death from loss of blood.

To change her fate, Edellis purchased Lehan the young gladiator from the arena, whom of what seemed to be the main character in the book, and showered him with love.  

However! Lehan, who she believed would protect her from the Emperor, returned as the Emperor himself asking for her hand in marriage?!

Edellis tried to flee but Lehan’s obsession got worse when he became the Emperor..!

Don’t Be Obsessed, Please Divorce Me!>
